about.title: About
bio: I’m Adis Hegic, a frontend developer from Sweden who loves crafting clean, pixel-perfect interfaces where design and performance go hand in hand.
I’m solution-oriented, collaborative, and curious — always pushing to learn more and ship better UX.
Day-to-day I work with React/Next.js, TypeScript and Tailwind, and I use Figma to move smoothly from idea to polished UI.
